channel.title: Invalid keystore format? error
channel.description:
http://snag.gy/6yM0U.jpg
as u can see im getting that "invalid keystore format" error while signing into the jar file, however iv tested the jar iv made in my desktop and its working. but when i try signing into the jar file i get this error, whats wrong? also do i even need to sign in when my client works?

item.title: Invalid keystore format? error
item.dc:creator: @warxscape warxscape
item.description:
@warxscape wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:527750”]Maybe it’s because you’re trying to load a .exe for your keystore file…
Have you ever read a tutorial on jaring?[/quote]

the tutorial was wrong, iv fixed it now

Read full topic

item.title: Invalid keystore format? error
item.dc:creator: @Pk6uhave2 Pk6uhave2
item.description:
@Pk6uhave2 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:527750”]Maybe it’s because you’re trying to load a .exe for your keystore file…
Have you ever read a tutorial on jaring?[/quote]

What he said. Visit this tutorial: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/466541-noob-friendly-how-jar-sign-your-rsps-client-noob-friendly.html

Read full topic
